info.title: ONOS ACL Application REST API
info.description: APIs for interacting with the ACL application.

post.summary: Processes user's POST HTTP request for add ACL rules

get.summary: Processes user's GET HTTP request for clearing ACL
Processes user's GET HTTP request for querying ACL rules
Processes user's GET HTTP request for removing ACL rule

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ACL rule id (in hex string format)
